channel.title: 3rd and 4rth dialogue option
channel.description:
yet again a problem: I want the dialogues with a 3rd and 4rth option also work but only the dialogues with 2 Options work these are the cases i use for it:
case 9157: //First Dialogue Option case 9158: //Second Dialogue Option case 9159: //Third Dialogue Option case 9160: //Fourth Dialogue Option
I only added the last two cases, I didn't do anything else can Somebody help me?

item.title: 3rd and 4rth dialogue option
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

good, it works.
thanks for fixing my prob

Read full topic

item.title: 3rd and 4rth dialogue option
item.dc:creator: @Adidishen Adidishen
item.description:
@Adidishen wrote:

these are wrong cases for 4 options. the right cases are:
9178 first option
9179 second option
9180 third option
9181 fourth option

the 9157 and 9158 cases are used for dialogues with only 2 options. for easier case detection, action buttons etc, download either p16 or cheez 78, they have some code that everytime you click anythin with a certain character, it gives you the information about what case you need to add for it to work etc.

Read full topic

item.title: 3rd and 4rth dialogue option
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

Rich Dude99:

What you could do… Is made two options and make those two stem off into the others, if you understand what I mean.

so something like?:

'Eat Cookie' 'Other...'
